comments.body: Are the headers really optional?  The [API Reference](https://github.com/hapijs/accept/blob/master/API.md) makes them seem mandatory.

I think they should be optional. a common usage would be 

```ts
accept.language(headers['accept-language']);
```

this is handled for example [here](https://github.com/hapijs/accept/blob/9046711d2bc91f0fc2a68aa1b767322b7a5d7b97/lib/language.js#L54)

I think I'm missing something - isn't your example usage passing the header parameter?

Superficially, the handling code you link appears to be hardening against bad imports.  Since TS has compile-time checking, it seems like preventing bad the call from being made in the first place would be preferable.
